attributes.description:
The Polo Vivo is equipped with many digital features such as :
Alloy wheels 6J x 15, R140G MIB2-G Entry PQ/MQB radio for ROW, Multi-function steering wheel, Front fog lamps and cornering light, Airbag for driver and front passenger, Air conditioning system, Anti-lock brake system (ABS),Exterior mirrors, adjustable from inside, Multi-function display, Standard dashboard & Drink Holder.

Financed vehicle are charged at an addition R25 000, require a 10% upfront deposit, and an additional R1990 administrative fee.

attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND TRADE IN. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted even for vehicles ththat are not fully papaid off, delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value. 
PRE-OWNED CAR DEALERSHIP IN JOHANNESBURG GAUTENG WITH VEHICLES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. YOU CAN COME THROUGH TO OUR DEALERSHIP AT NO. 6 JOUBERT STREET AND CORNER ALBERT, BEHIND SARS OFFICES. PLEASE DO CONTACT OUR EXECUTIVE SALES REP. VUYO ON 0763933070 OR CALL ON 0100234810. 

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.
